data.name: ChangeWorkingDirectory_Description
data.value: This action sets the current working directory for an FTP connection

data.name: ChangeWorkingDirectory_SetWorkingDirectoryTo_Description
data.value: Set the path to be set as the working directory

data.name: CloseConnection_Description
data.value: This action closes an open FTP connection

data.name: ConnectWithFtpsExplicit_Description
data.value: Establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server with FTPS explicit

data.name: ConnectWithFtpsExplicit_Summary
data.value: Connect to FTP server using account <USERNAME> and protocol FTPS explicit

data.name: ConnectWithFtpsImplicit_Description
data.value: Establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server with FTPS implicit

data.name: ConnectWithFtpsImplicit_Summary
data.value: Connect to FTP server using account <USERNAME> and protocol FTPS implicit

data.name: ConnectWithSftpPrivateKeyAndPassPhrase_Description
data.value: Establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server with SFTP and authenticates using a private key and a passphrase

data.name: ConnectWithSftpPrivateKeyAndPassPhrase_Summary
data.value: Connect to FTP server using account <USERNAME> and protocol SFTP

data.name: ConnectWithSftpPrivateKey_Description
data.value: Establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server with SFTP and authenticates using a private key

data.name: ConnectWithSftpPrivateKey_Summary
data.value: Connect to FTP server using account <USERNAME> and protocol SFTP

data.name: ConnectWithSftpUsernameAndPassword_Description
data.value: Establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server with SFTP and authenticates using username and password

data.name: ConnectWithSftpUsernameAndPassword_Summary
data.value: Connect to FTP server using account <USERNAME> and protocol SFTP

data.name: CreateDirectory_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: CreateDirectory_Description
data.value: Creates a directory on an FTP server

data.name: CreateDirectory_Directory_Description
data.value: The new directory. If a path is specified, all of the new folders leading to the new directory will be created

data.name: CreateDirectory_Summary
data.value: Create directory <DIRECTORY> on the FTP server

data.name: DeleteDirectory_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: DeleteDirectory_Description
data.value: Deletes a directory from an FTP server

data.name: DeleteDirectory_Directory_Description
data.value: The folder to delete. Everything in the folder will be deleted as well

data.name: DeleteFiles_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: DeleteFiles_Description
data.value: Deletes one or more files from an FTP server

data.name: DownloadFiles_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: DownloadFiles_Description
data.value: Downloads one or more files from an FTP server

data.name: DownloadFiles_DownloadInto_Description
data.value: The folder to be the destination of the file(s) that will be downloaded

data.name: DownloadFiles_IfFileExists_Description
data.value: Specify what to do if the file already exists. Overwrite the original file or download with unique name to add an underscore and a sequential number to the end

data.name: DownloadFiles_TransferType_Description
data.value: Enter ASCII or binary to specify the method for downloading a single file. If the file type is uncertain, or more than one is downloaded, choose Auto to follow the transfer rules specified in options

data.name: DownloadFolders_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: DownloadFolders_Description
data.value: Downloads one or more folders from an FTP server

data.name: DownloadFolders_DownloadInto_Description
data.value: The full path of the destination of the FTP folder(s) you are downloading

data.name: DownloadFolders_RemotePath_Description
data.value: The name of the folder path(s), or FTP folder(s) to download

data.name: ErrorMessage_CannotChangeWorkingDirectory
data.value: Can't change the working directory to {0}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_CannotDeleteDirectory
data.value: Can't delete directory: {0}. Make sure that the directory exists and that you have sufficient permissions to delete it.

data.name: ErrorMessage_CannotDownloadFile
data.value: Can't download file: {0}. Error while deducing the file paths to use for the local copies.

data.name: ErrorMessage_CannotUploadFileRemotePathError
data.value: Can't upload file: {0}. Error while deducing the path to use for the remote copy.

data.name: ErrorMessage_CannotUploadFolder
data.value: Can't upload folder: {0}. An unexplained error occurred. See the logs for details.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FileExists
data.value: The path specified refers to an already existing file.

data.name: ErrorMessage_FileNotFound
data.value: The system can't find the file specified.

data.name: ErrorMessage_ListingError
data.value: Error occurred while listing or creating the {0} directory: {1}.

data.name: ErrorMessage_SynchorizationFailed
data.value: Synchronize failed due to an unexpected error. Make sure there are no corrupted files in either the source or target.

data.name: ErrorMessage_SystemCannotFindFile
data.value: The system can't find the file specified.

data.name: Error_AccessDeniedError_Description
data.value: Indicates that this account doesn't have access for an operation

data.name: Error_CannotChangeWorkingDirectoryError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it isn't possible to change the working directory

data.name: Error_CannotDeleteFileError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the deletion of the file wasn't possible

data.name: Error_CannotDownloadDirectoryError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it wasn't possible to download the directory

data.name: Error_CannotDownloadFileError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it wasn't possible to download the file

data.name: Error_CannotRenameFileError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it wasn't possible to rename the file

data.name: Error_ConnectionError_Description
data.value: Indicates that there is a problem with the connection

data.name: Error_CreateDirectoryError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it wasn't possible creating the directory

data.name: Error_DeleteDirectoryError_Description
data.value: Indicates that it wasn't possible to delete the directory

data.name: Error_DirectoryDoesNotExistError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the directory couldn't be found

data.name: Error_FileExistsError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the file already exists

data.name: Error_FileNotFoundError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the file wasn't found

data.name: Error_FTPConnectionAbortedError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the FTP connection was aborted

data.name: Error_InvokeCommandError_Description
data.value: Indicates that an error occurred while invoking an FTP command

data.name: Error_ListingError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the listing of the folder couldn't be performed

data.name: Error_NotConnectedError_Description
data.value: Indicates that there is no open connection with the FTP server

data.name: Error_RemoteDirectoryDoesNotExistError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the directory doesn't exist on the FTP server

data.name: Error_RemoteFileDoesNotExistError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the file doesn't exist on the FTP server

data.name: Error_SynchronizationFailedError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the synchronization process failed due to an unexpected error.

data.name: Error_UploadDirectoryError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the directory couldn't be uploaded

data.name: Error_UploadFileError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the file couldn't be uploaded

data.name: Error_WorkingDirectoryChangeError_Description
data.value: Indicates that the working directory couldn't be changed

data.name: FtpFilesToSync_ExcludeFilter_FriendlyName
data.value: Only files not matching the file filter

data.name: FtpFilesToSync_IncludeFilter_FriendlyName
data.value: Only files matching the file filter

data.name: FTP_Description
data.value: Manage files and folders on an FTP server

data.name: InvokeCommand_Command_Description
data.value: The command to run along with any arguments. For example, you could run FEAT, or CHMOD here

data.name: InvokeCommand_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an open FTP connection action

data.name: InvokeCommand_Description
data.value: Invokes the given literal FTP command on the server

data.name: InvokeCommand_ReplyCode_Description
data.value: The actual code that was returned. Only applies over simple FTP or FTPS connections

data.name: InvokeCommand_ReplyText_Description
data.value: The text returned by the FTP server

data.name: InvokeCommand_Summary
data.value: Invoke the command <COMMAND> on the FTP server

data.name: InvokeCommand_ValidReplyCodes_Description
data.value: The code(s) that could be returned by the command, separated by semi-colon. If the FTP command returns a code that wasn't entered here, this action will throw an exception. Only applies over simple FTP or FTPS connections

data.name: ListDirectory_Description
data.value: This action returns the subdirectories and files contained in the current directory of an FTP connection

data.name: ListDirectory_Path_Description
data.value: The path that you want to list.

data.name: OpenConnection_ActiveMode_Description
data.value: Specify the mode of the connection

data.name: OpenConnection_Description
data.value: This action establishes a specific connection to a remote FTP server, and stores that connection as a variable for later use.

data.name: OpenConnection_Host_Description
data.value: Enter the FTP server address here.

data.name: OpenConnection_Password_Description
data.value: Specify the password of the FTP account to use

data.name: OpenConnection_Port_Description
data.value: Enter the FTP server port here.

data.name: OpenConnection_Timeout_Description
data.value: Set the time in seconds that you want to wait for the connection to be established before the action fails

data.name: OpenConnection_Username_Description
data.value: Specify the username of the FTP account to use

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_AcceptUntrustedCertificates_Description
data.value: Specify whether untrusted certificates will be accepted

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_ActiveMode_Description
data.value: Specify the mode of the connection

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_AuthenticationMethod_Description
data.value: Choose the method you wish to use to authenticate yourself on the FTP server

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Description
data.value: This action establishes a specific secure connection to a remote FTP server, and stores that connection as a variable for later use

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Host_Description
data.value: Enter the FTP server address here.

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Password_Description
data.value: Specify the password of the FTP account you wish to use

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_PathToPrivateKey_Description
data.value: Enter the file path to the private-key to be used for authentication

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Port_Description
data.value: Enter the FTP server port here.

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_PrivateKeyPassPhrase_Description
data.value: Enter a variable containing the private-key pass phrase here

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_SecureFtpProtocol_Description
data.value: Choose the FTP protocol you wish to use to encrypt your connection

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Timeout_Description
data.value: Set the time in seconds to wait for the connection to be established before the action fails

data.name: OpenSecureConnection_Username_Description
data.value: Specify the username of the FTP account to use

data.name: RenameFile_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: RenameFile_Description
data.value: Renames a file that resides on an FTP server

data.name: RenameFile_NewFileName_Description
data.value: The new name for the file. Enter a name with a path to move the file to that location. If the location doesn't exist, the action will throw an exception

data.name: RenameFile_Summary
data.value: Change the name of the FTP file <FILETORENAME> to <NEWFILENAME>

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_DeleteIfSourceAbsent_Description
data.value: This option will delete a file or folder which exists in the target directory and not the source.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_Description
data.value: Synchronize the files and subdirectories of a given Folder with a given remote FTP directory

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FileFilter_Description
data.value: Filename pattern that controls which files will be included or excluded. This option allows wildcards such as "*.txt" , "document?.doc". The option also allows for multiple filters by using coma as a separator, "*.txt,*.pdf,document?"

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FilesAdded_Description
data.value: List of files that initially existed in the source and after the synchronization process were added to the target.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FilesDeleted_Description
data.value: List of files that initially existed in the target directory and after the synchronization process were deleted.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FilesModified_Description
data.value: List of files that initially existed in both the source and the target and after the synchronization process were added to the target.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FilesToSync_Description
data.value: Choose whether you want to synchronize all files, or you want to use a file filter to include or exclude a specific set of files

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FtpDirectory_Description
data.value: Name of the FTP directory to be synchronized

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FtpFilesAdded_Description
data.value: List of FTP files that initially existed in the source and after the synchronization process were added to the target.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FtpFilesDeleted_Description
data.value: List of FTP files that initially existed in the target directory and after the synchronization process were deleted.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_FtpFilesModified_Description
data.value: List of FTP files that initially existed in both the source and the target and after the synchronization process were added to the target.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_IncludeSubdirectories_Description
data.value: This option will include subdirectories in the synchronization process.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_LocalFolder_Description
data.value: Name of the local folder to be synchronized

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_Summary
data.value: Synchronize Target directory <LOCALFOLDER> with source <REMOTEDIRECTORY> or source <LOCALFOLDER> with target <REMOTEDIRECTORY>

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_SynchronizationDirection_Description
data.value: Direction of the Synchronization method. Whether the local folder will be synchronized to the remote directory (DOWNLOAD) or the remote directory will be synchronized to the local folder (UPLOAD)

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_TimeDifferenceAhead_Description
data.value: Specify whether the server's time zone is ahead or not.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_TimeDifferenceHours_Description
data.value: Time difference in hours of the remote server in case it operates on a different Time Zone.

data.name: SynchronizeDirectoryAction_TimeDifferenceMinutes_Description
data.value: Time difference in minutes of the remote server in case it operates on a different Time Zone.

data.name: SynchronizeDownload_Summary
data.value: The local folder will be synchronized to the remote directory.

data.name: SynchronizeUpload_Summary
data.value: The remote directory will be synchronized to the local folder.

data.name: UploadFiles_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: UploadFiles_Description
data.value: Uploads one or more files to an FTP server

data.name: UploadFiles_IfFileExists_Description
data.value: Specify what to do if the file already exists. Overwrite the original file or download with unique name to add an underscore and a sequential number to the end

data.name: UploadFiles_RemoteLocation_Description
data.value: The location where the files should be uploaded

data.name: UploadFiles_TransferType_Description
data.value: Enter ASCII or binary to specify the method for downloading a single file. If you're not sure what type the file will be, or if you are downloading more than one, choose Auto to follow the transfer rules specified in Options

data.name: UploadFolders_Connection_Description
data.value: The FTP connection to work with. This variable must have been previously specified in an Open FTP connection action

data.name: UploadFolders_Description
data.value: Uploads one or more folders to an FTP server

data.name: UploadFolders_Folders_Description
data.value: The folder(s) to upload. The folders being uploaded should not already exist within the active directory of the FTP server

data.name: UploadFolders_RemoteLocation_Description
data.value: The location where the folders should be uploaded
